Package org.forgerock.openam.sts

Interface HttpURLConnectionWrapper

  • public interface HttpURLConnectionWrapper
    Several STS constituents make REST calls to OpenAM. This interface defines the concerns of wrapping the HttpURLConnection so that the boilerplate pertaining to making these calls can be encapsulated in a single place. Note that it is not intended to be a generic Http Client, but rather encapsulate some of the functionality shared across multiple consumers of OpenAM REST APIs in the sts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  HttpURLConnectionWrapper.ConnectionResult
      Class which encapsulates the result of the HttpURLConnection invocation.
